data.actual_result: The client will lockup, disconnect you from the websocket. And you will stop receiving notifications for a few seconds until Discord resumes the connection. (check attachment)
data.expected_result: You should be able to navigate Discord w/o issues
data.short_description: If you enter direct messages or switch between DMs, the client will lockup and you will see a WS closed event in console
data.steps_to_repro: - Observe the console - Go to DMs - Try to switch between open DMs in the recent DM list and observe console
